Articles.Content:
Hello,

I\'m Benjamin, a 5\' 10' human male who\'s not terribly clever when it comes to usernames. I\'m a science fiction writer, and a college student. I have a love for science, and space exploration, which is why my love for KSP is as massive as the sun (but not quite so bright). I\'ve only been playing for about a week, but I\'ve already logged dozens hours in the game, currently doing munshots and the like. I\'m looking forward to this games\' future with the utmost enthusiasm, and to meeting the community with which I share it.

Regards,

B.H. Lawrence
